Package de.feu.massim22.group3.agents.utilsV2

Class DesireUtilities

java.lang.Object
de.feu.massim22.group3.agents.utilsV2.DesireUtilities
public class DesireUtilities extends Object
The class DesireUtilities contains all the methods that are necessary for working the desires .
Author:
Melinda Betz, Heinz Stadler (minor contribution)
